attributes.action: To not feign support for English Rugby Union teams
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown is a Scotsman, clearly and transparently trying to ingratiate himself on the English public for political gain, by  piggybacking an unexpectedly successful world-cup run by England. 

We appeal for him to not seek political gain on the back of heroic efforts by those whose boots he is not fit to clean, whilst he demonstrates gross political cowardice by shirking elections on poor polling, and a promised European Constitutional Referendum for fear of losing.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
